name: Mister Obvious Steve
description:
Simple Godot 2D game by following BornCG Godot2D tutorial
With some modification for fun.

I thought I was a programmer, but somehow I turned into a chef while working on this project and made a delicious spaghetti...code. 

I might re-architect the whole code and modify this game or just build new project with same idea to get better in Godot. 

Godot is amazing for 2D Platformer, but it has it's own quirks. Keeny arts is amazing and used for this project, the robot (Steve) was missing a sword, so I had the honor to add that to him to make him ever more cuter than he is. No need to thank me, just doing good to the world of gaming.
The bgm used in the game is original, and it was supposed to be for the Cozy gamejam which unfortunately I couldn't make it.
